original_text: And when he had broken down the altars and the groves, and had beaten the graven images into powder, and cut down all the idols throughout all the land of Israel, he returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 제단들을 허물며 아세라 목상들과 아로새긴 우상들을 빻아 가루를 만들며 온 이스라엘 땅에 있는 모든 태양상을 찍고 예루살렘으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: And when he had broken down the altars and the groves,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 제단과 아세라 상들을 무너뜨렸을 때,

sentences.original_text: and had beaten the graven images into powder,
and cut down all the idols
throughout all the land of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 온 이스라엘 땅에 두루 퍼져 있었고,
